column1: Notes All information except the given name and family name are optional.
Role should be something like “General Chair”, “Program Chair”, “Doctoral Consortium Chair”.
The affiliation should be just the organization
Multiple affiliations should be separated by a backslash character Affiliation1 \ Affiliation2
